name: Crabtree Brewery
description: The Crabtree Brewing Company is dedicated to serving the environment, the community, our customers, and our valued employees.  Requiring the best ingredients to support unique premium beers.  Keeping a dynamic business mind while remaining modestly profitable.   Employing technology, embracing ethics, growing to meet the needs of our customers and employees, and having fun doing what we loveï¿½.Making Great Beer.
